results.title: The Afterlife of Willem de Kooning
results.abstract: The artist’s ghost lingers in his studio, as an auction of three of his paintings tests the vitality of his commercial reputation.

multimedia.caption: Two paintings by Willem de Kooning in the artist’s studio in East Hampton. Left to right, “Untitled” (circa 1979) and “Montauk II” (1969). Sotheby’s is auctioning three paintings by the Abstract Expressionist master in November.
multimedia.copyright: The Willem de Kooning Foundation/Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York; George Etheredge for The New York Times
